data.lyric:
[ti:It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas]
[ar:Perry Como]
[al:Pure... Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas - Perry Como (佩里·科莫)/The Fontane Sisters/Mitchell Ayres & His Orchestra
[00:12.82]It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas
[00:15.96]
[00:17.36]Everywhere you go
[00:20.35]
[00:21.22]Take a look at the five and ten
[00:23.80]It's glistening once again
[00:25.81]With candy canes and silver lanes aglow
[00:28.58]
[00:29.95]It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas
[00:32.92]
[00:34.57]Toys in every store
[00:37.68]
[00:38.81]But the prettiest sight to see is the holly that will be
[00:42.97]On your own front door
[00:45.93]
[00:46.91]A pair of hopalong boots and a pistol that shoots
[00:49.47]Is the wish of Barney and Ben
[00:51.69]Dolls that will talk and will go for a walk
[00:54.29]Is the hope of Janice and Jen
[00:55.84]And Mom and Dad can hardly wait for school to start again
[00:59.46]
[01:04.25]It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas
[01:07.55]
[01:08.91]Everywhere you go
[01:11.67]
[01:12.59]There's a tree in the Grand Hotel one in the park as well
[01:16.68]
[01:17.26]It's the sturdy kind that doesn't mind the snow
[01:20.04]
[01:21.47]It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas
[01:24.98]
[01:25.91]Soon the bells will start
[01:29.03]
[01:29.76]And the thing that will make them ring is the carol that you sing
[01:34.11]Right within your heart
[01:37.82]
[01:55.24]A pair of hopalong boots and a pistol that shoots
[01:57.64]Is the wish of Barney and Ben
[01:59.87]Dolls that will talk and will go for a walk
[02:02.45]Is the hope of Janice and Jen
[02:04.07]And Mom and Dad can hardly wait for school to start again
[02:07.38]
[02:08.08]Ah ahh
[02:08.88]
[02:12.21]It's beginning to look a lot like Christmas
[02:15.21]
[02:16.61]Soon the bells will start
[02:19.71]
[02:20.63]And the thing that will make them ring is the carol that you sing
[02:24.83]Right within your heart
data.trans:
[ti:It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas]
[ar:Perry Como]
[al:Pure... Christmas]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:12.81]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[00:15.96]
[00:17.36]不论你走到哪儿
[00:20.35]
[00:21.21]瞧一眼小卖部
[00:23.79]又开始闪耀夺目
[00:25.80]糖果手杖，银色小巷
[00:28.57]
[00:29.95]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[00:32.92]
[00:34.56]每个商店的玩具
[00:37.68]
[00:38.81]但那最美的风景仍是
[00:42.97]自家门前的那颗冬青树
[00:45.93]
[00:46.90]一双期待已久的靴子
[00:49.47]这是Barney 和Ben的愿望
[00:51.68]会说话和走路的布娃娃
[00:54.29]是Janice和Jen的希望
[00:55.84]爸爸和妈妈不在等待再次开学
[00:59.46]
[01:04.25]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[01:07.55]
[01:08.91]不论你走到哪儿
[01:11.67]
[01:12.59]都会有一棵树在饭店里 像在公园里的一样
[01:16.68]
[01:17.26]强健不畏风雪
[01:20.04]
[01:21.47]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[01:24.98]
[01:25.91]马上钟声就要敲响
[01:29.03]
[01:29.76]使它响起的正是那歌谣
[01:34.11]在你心中所唱
[01:37.82]
[01:55.24]一双期待已久的靴子
[01:57.64]这是Barney 和Ben的愿望
[01:59.87]会说话和走路的布娃娃
[02:02.45]是Janice和Jen的希望
[02:04.07]爸爸和妈妈不在等待再次开学
[02:07.38]
[02:08.08]//
[02:08.88]
[02:12.21]圣诞气氛开始浓厚
[02:15.21]
[02:16.61]马上钟声就要敲响
[02:19.71]
[02:20.63]使它响起的正是那歌谣
[02:24.83]在你心中所唱
[02:30.86]
